name: BenchmarkAnything
body:
### About

A common schema and tools in different languages and systems to store and process benchmark results.

### JSON schema

* [benchmark-anything-schema.json](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Schema/master/share/benchmark-anything-schema.json)

### Libraries and tools

* [schema validation](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Schema)
* [database backend](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Storage-Backend-SQL)
* [Perl library](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Storage-Frontend-Lib)
* [cmdline utilities](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Storage-Frontend-Tools)
* [HTTP/REST server](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Storage-Frontend-HTTP)
* [HTTP reporter](https://github.com/benchmarkanything/BenchmarkAnything-Reporter)

### Applications using it

* [Perl::Formance](http://perlformance.net/)

### Authors and Contributors

* Roberto Sch√§fer (@schaefr-aws)
* Steffen Schwigon (@renormalist)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
